attributes.action: Have a lifetime ban for voting on every illegal immigrant entering the country.
attributes.additional_details: Because they do not hold the right to influence our way of life illegally.
attributes.background: Prevent illegal immigrants having the right to vote in the UK.

rejection.details:
Illegal immigrants are already unable to vote.

You could submit a new petition requesting for people who do not pay certain taxes to be banned from voting in general or local elections, if that's something you'd like to happen.
